bind.calculate: if((/data/weight_at_birth < 2.5 and /data/days_since_birth < 30) or (/data/newborn/newborn_high_risk = 'yes' and /data/days_since_birth < 150) or (/data/dtp_vaccine = 'no' and /data/days_since_birth > 150) or (/data/bf_alert = 'yes' and /data/days_since_birth < 150) or /data/newborn_vaccine_complete = 'no' or (/data/infant/measles_immunization = 'no' and /data/days_since_birth > 365), 'yes','no')

if((/data/weight_at_birth < 2.5) and /data/days_since_birth < 7, date(today() + 1), if(/data/newborn/newborn_high_risk = 'yes' and /data/days_since_birth < 28, date(today() + 2), if(/data/dtp_vaccine = 'no' and /data/days_since_birth > 150, date(today() + 3), if((/data/weight_at_birth < 2.5) and /data/days_since_birth < 30, date(today() + 3), if(/data/bf_alert = 'yes', date(today() + 3), if(/data/newborn_vaccine_complete = 'no', date(today() + 7), if(/data/infant/measles_immunization = 'no' and /data/days_since_birth > 365, date(today() + 30), if(/data/newborn/newborn_high_risk = 'yes', date(today() + 30), date(today() + 1000)))))))))

if(/data/next_visit_type = 'newborn', if(/data/total_newborn_visits = 1, /data/child_v5b_date, if(/data/total_newborn_visits = 2, /data/child_v5c_date, /data/child_v5d_date)), if(/data/next_visit_type = 'infant', if(/data/total_infant_visits = 1, /data/child_v7_date, if(/data/total_infant_visits = 2, /data/child_v8_date, if(/data/total_infant_visits = 3, /data/child_v9_date, if(/data/total_infant_visits = 4, /data/child_v10_date, /data/child_v11_date)))), /data/follow_up_date))

text.value: Was the father or chosen supporter present during this visit?

Cord stump with redness, or selling extending to the skin
More than 10 pustules (or spots) found in the skin

Wash hands with soap at 3 critical times?

Eating from the three food groups?
